verses.verse: <S%G1722>At<s%> that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G189>fame<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3816>servants,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> and <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works do <S%G1754>show<s%> <S%G1754>forth<s%> themselves in him.

For <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had laid <S%G2902>hold<s%> on <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> him, and <S%G5087>put<s%> him in <S%G5438>prison<s%> for <S%G2266>Herodias'<s%> sake, his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip's<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%>
For <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for you to <S%G2192>have<s%> her.

And when he <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G615>put<s%> him to <S%G615>death,<s%> he <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2192>counted<s%> him as a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

But when <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> <S%G1077>birthday<s%> was <S%G71>kept,<s%> the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G3738>danced<s%> <S%G3319>before<s%> them, and <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G2264>Herod.<s%>
<S%G3606>Whereupon<s%> he <S%G3670>promised<s%> with an <S%G3727>oath<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> her <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> she would <S%G154>ask.<s%>

And she, being <S%G4264>before<s%> <S%G4264>instructed<s%> of her <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1325>Give<s%> me <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G910>Baptist's<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> in a <S%G4094>charger.<s%>

And the <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G3076>sorry:<s%> nevertheless for the <S%G3727>oath's<s%> sake, and them which <S%G4873>sat<s%> with him <S%G4873>at<s%> meat, he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> it to be <S%G1325>given<s%> her.
And he <S%G3992>sent,<s%> and <S%G607>beheaded<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> in the <S%G5438>prison.<s%>
And his <S%G2776>head<s%> was <S%G5342>brought<s%> in a <S%G4094>charger,<s%> and <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G2877>damsel:<s%> and she <S%G5342>brought<s%> it to her <S%G3384>mother.<s%>
And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> up the <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G2290>buried<s%> it, and <S%G2064>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, he <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there<s%> by <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2596>apart:<s%> <S%G2398><s%> and when the <S%G3793>people<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> thereof, they <S%G190>followed<s%> him <S%G3979>on<s%> <S%G3979>foot<s%> out of the <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and was <S%G4697>moved<s%> with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> them, and he <S%G2323>healed<s%> their <S%G732>sick.<s%>

And when it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and the <S%G5610>time<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G3928>past;<s%> <S%G630>send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> that they may <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1033>victuals.<s%>
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, They need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G565>depart;<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> you them to eat. <S%G5315><s%>
And they <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> but <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>
He <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5342>Bring<s%> them <S%G5602>here<s%> to me.

And he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to <S%G347>sit<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5528>grass,<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> and <S%G308>looking<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> the <S%G740>loaves<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

And they did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and were <S%G5526>filled:<s%> and they <S%G142>took<s%> up of the <S%G2801>fragments<s%> that <S%G4052>remained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full.<s%>
And they that had <S%G2068>eaten<s%> were <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G5565>beside<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> and <S%G3813>children.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G315>constrained<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1684>get<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and to <S%G4254>go<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> him to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> he <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away.<s%>

And when he had <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> he <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2596>apart<s%> <S%G2398><s%> to <S%G4336>pray:<s%> and when the <S%G3798>evening<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he was <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>
But the <S%G4143>ship<s%> was <S%G2235>now<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G928>tossed<s%> with <S%G2949>waves:<s%> for the <S%G417>wind<s%> was <S%G1727>contrary.<s%>
And in the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> to them, <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And when the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they were <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It is a <S%G5326>spirit;<s%> and they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out for <S%G5401>fear.<s%>
But <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Be of good <S%G2293>cheer;<s%> it is I; be not afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it be you, <S%G2753>bid<s%> me <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5204>water.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%> And when <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> he <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5204>water,<s%> to <S%G2064>go<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But when he <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2478>boisterous,<s%> he was <S%G5399>afraid;<s%> and <S%G756>beginning<s%> to <S%G2670>sink,<s%> he <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> me.

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1614>stretched<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G1949>caught<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, O you of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith,<s%> why <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you doubt? <S%G1365><s%>
And when they were <S%G1684>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>ceased.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> they that were in the <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And when they were <S%G1276>gone<s%> <S%G1276>over,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G1082>Gennesaret.<s%>

And when the <S%G435>men<s%> of that <S%G5117>place<s%> had <S%G1921>knowledge<s%> of him, they <S%G649>sent<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> that <S%G4066>country<s%> <S%G4066>round<s%> <S%G4066>about,<s%> and <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G2560>diseased;<s%>

And <S%G3870>sought<s%> him that they might <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> the <S%G2899>hem<s%> of his <S%G2440>garment:<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G680>touched<s%> were <S%G1295>made<s%> <S%G1295>perfectly<s%> <S%G1295>whole.<s%>
